posts.post_content:
I have two T209 II Lavoia's both graded by SGC, both display very well.  One is a SGC 40 and is really clean with no flaking or paper loss.  The other is SGC A and is trimmed around the picture, but the picture itself is really bold and has no flaking whatsoever.

I'd like to trade one of these for an equivalent grade T209 II that I don't have.  If you're interested, shoot me an e-mail.  Thanks!

-Seth
*Bump* after a long time.  I still have these cards, and would still love to trade either one of them for a T209 II that I don't have.
